verses.verse: וְאַתָּ֤ה <WH859> ve-'at-Tah and you בֶן־ <WH1121> ven- Therefore thou son אָדָם֙ <WH120> 'a-Dam of man הִנָּבֵ֣א <WH5012> hin-na-Ve prophesy עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- against גּ֔וֹג <WH1463> Gog, against Gog וְאָ֣מַרְתָּ֔ <WH559> ve-'A-mar-ta, and say כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> koh Thus אָמַ֖ר <WH559> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <WH3069> Yah-weh; GOD הִנְנִ֤י <WH2005> hin-Ni behold אֵלֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH413> 'e-Lei-cha I am against גּ֔וֹג <WH1463> Gog, Behold I [am] against thee O Gog נְשִׂ֕יא <WH5387> ne-Si prince רֹ֖אשׁ <WH7218> rosh the chief מֶ֥שֶׁךְ <WH4902> Me-shech of Meshech וְתֻבָֽל׃ <WH8422> ve-tu-Val. and Tubal

וְשֹׁבַבְתִּ֙יךָ֙ <WH7725> ve-shoav-Ti-cha And I will turn thee back וְשִׁשֵּׁאתִ֔יךָ <WH8338> ve-shish-she-Ti-cha, and leave but the sixth part וְהַעֲלִיתִ֖יךָ <WH5927> ve-ha-'a-li-Ti-cha of thee and will cause thee to come up מִיַּרְכְּתֵ֣י <WH3411> mi-yar-ke-Tei parts צָפ֑וֹן <WH6828> tza-Fon; from the north וַהֲבִאוֹתִ֖ךָ <WH935> va-ha-vi-'o-Ti-cha and will bring עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- against הָרֵ֥י <WH2022> ha-Rei thee upon the mountains יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

וְהִכֵּיתִ֥י <WH5221> ve-hik-kei-Ti And I will smite קַשְׁתְּךָ֖ <WH7198> kash-te-Cha thy bow מִיַּ֣ד <WH3027> mi-Yad hand שְׂמֹאולֶ֑ךָ <WH8040> se-mo-Le-cha; out of thy left וְחִצֶּ֕יךָ <WH2671> ve-chitz-Tzei-cha and will cause thine arrows מִיַּ֥ד <WH3027> mi-Yad hand יְמִינְךָ֖ <WH3225> ye-mi-ne-Cha out of thy right אַפִּֽיל׃ <WH5307> 'ap-Pil. to fall

עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on הָרֵ֨י <WH2022> ha-Rei upon the mountains יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel תִּפּ֗וֹל <WH5307> tip-Pol, Thou shalt fall אַתָּה֙ <WH859> 'at-Tah you וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all אֲגַפֶּ֔יךָ <WH102> 'a-gap-Pei-cha, thou and all thy bands וְעַמִּ֖ים <WH5971> ve-'am-Mim and the people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who אִתָּ֑ךְ <WH854> 'it-Tach; for לְעֵ֨יט <WH5861> le-'Eit thee unto the ravenous צִפּ֧וֹר <WH6833> tzip-Por birds כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- to every כָּנָ֛ף <WH3671> ka-Naf of every sort וְחַיַּ֥ת <WH2416> ve-chai-Yat and [to] the beasts הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <WH7704> has-sa-Deh of the field נְתַתִּ֥יךָ <WH5414> ne-tat-Ti-cha that [is] with thee I will give לְאָכְלָֽה׃ <WH402> le-'och-Lah to be devoured

עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> pe-Nei upon the open הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <WH7704> has-sa-Deh field תִּפּ֑וֹל <WH5307> tip-Pol; Thou shalt fall כִּ֚י <WH3588> ki for אֲנִ֣י <WH589> 'a-Ni is I דִבַּ֔רְתִּי <WH1696> dib-Bar-ti, for I have spoken נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> ne-'Um [it] saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3069> Yah-weh. GOD

וְשִׁלַּחְתִּי־ <WH7971> ve-shil-lach-ti- And I will send אֵ֣שׁ <WH784> 'esh a fire בְּמָג֔וֹג <WH4031> be-ma-Gog, on Magog וּבְיֹשְׁבֵ֥י <WH3427> u-ve-yo-she-Vei and among them that dwell הָאִיִּ֖ים <WH339> ha-'i-Yim in the isles לָבֶ֑טַח <WH983> la-Ve-tach; carelessly וְיָדְע֖וּ <WH3045> ve-ya-de-'U and they shall know כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- that אֲנִ֥י <WH589> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. that I [am] the LORD

וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- They will not יִשְׂא֨וּ <WH5375> yis-'U So that they shall take עֵצִ֜ים <WH6086> 'e-Tzim no wood מִן־ <WH4480> min- from הַשָּׂדֶ֗ה <WH7704> has-sa-Deh, out of the field וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> ve-Lo or יַחְטְבוּ֙ <WH2404> yach-te-Vu neither cut down מִן־ <WH4480> min- from הַיְּעָרִ֔ים <WH3293> hai-ye-'a-Rim, [any] out of the forests כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki with בַנֶּ֖שֶׁק <WH5402> van-Ne-shek the weapons יְבַֽעֲרוּ־ <WH1197> ye-va-'a-ru- for they shall burn אֵ֑שׁ <WH784> 'Esh; with fire וְשָׁלְל֣וּ <WH7997> ve-shal-Lu and they shall spoil אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שֹׁלְלֵיהֶ֗ם <WH7997> sho-le-lei-Hem, those that spoiled וּבָֽזְזוּ֙ <WH962> u-va-ze-Zu them and rob אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בֹּ֣זְזֵיהֶ֔ם <WH962> bo-ze-zei-Hem, those that robbed נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> ne-'Um them saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3069> Yah-weh.
